text: use API https://rxnav.nlm.nih.gov/REST/rxclass defined early 2026 simplify classification drugs. assume rxcui identifier available drug interest. package designed large scale interrogation API, might lead banning host IP address overuse. loops include sleep directives.

title: rxclassR: use the NIH rxclass API for drug classification
